title.rendered: Life Lesson From ‘Eat Pray Love’ In Quotes

content.rendered:
Gosh! How we all dived in to watch this movie when it was released. Eat Pray Love, the movie and the novel encapsulated some essential life lessons about self-discovery, food, love, and spirituality. The Coronacoaster has left us all feeling uncertain and anxious about our career, life, and even ourselves. But guess what? We can all find a little hope, and maybe even some life lessons in the words of Elizabeth Gilbert.

While the ‘new normal’ is a hard adjustment, these motivational quotes from our favorite movie, will restore our faith, strengthen us and help us love ourselves (and pizza).

Life Lessons On Strength ?

https://in.pinterest.com/pin/14566398786242952/

Life Lessons On Love

https://in.pinterest.com/pin/16747829855501659/

Life Lessons On Self Discovery ?

https://in.pinterest.com/pin/13581236368251089/

Related: 30 Beautiful Quotes & Affirmations On Self Love To Start Your Day Right

Life Lessons On Spirituality ??

https://in.pinterest.com/pin/52002570688394830/

In conclusion, we love “Eat, Pray Love.”

Life is undoubtedly filled with moments of happiness, despair, peace, laughter, brokenness, and even gloom. But these are the moments that teach us about discovery, strength, love, and, most of all, spirituality. In our weakest moments, we can truly understand the afflictions and infirmities of everyone around us. Our pain teaches us what joy is, and our suffering teaches us empathy. To unearth peace, we must find God and learn to accept & love ourselves.

D’you know what else Roomi does outside of helping its readers find some joy and life lessons from the movie Eat Pray Love? With our ever-increasing lists of rooms and roommates across the world, we help you find your perfect match! Download the app here and hop on the easiest ride home, ever!

jetpack-related-posts.title: Valentines Day Special! A Library Of Timeless Love Quotes
jetpack-related-posts.author: Team Roomi
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: Valentine's day is around the corner, and it's that time of the year when we make our favorite ones feel extra special. So if you're looking for the perfect love quotes to add to your handmade card or some non-cheesy captions for Instagram - then our collection will come in…

jetpack-related-posts.title: Motivational Quotes To Help Get Your Sh*t Together
jetpack-related-posts.author: Team Roomi
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: Something that we're all looking for, from the moment we wake up, to the moment we shut our eyes in the hopes of falling asleep, is motivation! The motivation to work, study, learn a skill or a hobby, and sometimes, even to sleep. But is it enough to look up…

img.alt_text: A wall painted with the words 'dream big' on the bottom right corner

jetpack-related-posts.title: 7 Motivational Movies All Aspiring Entrepreneurs & Young Professionals Must Watch
jetpack-related-posts.author: Team Roomi
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: Everyone has days when they're feeling low and uninspired. When being productive just isn't possible. That's normal. But what sets you apart is how well you're able to pick yourself back up. Now, sometimes you need a little jolt of inspiration to get you out of your rut. So, the…

img.alt_text: A woman sitting in bed with popcorn, watching movies

jetpack-related-posts.title: 30 Inspiring Quotes & Affirmations On Self Love
jetpack-related-posts.author: Team Roomi
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: Self love is the act of genuinely loving who you are without reservation. When you achieve it, you feel loved unconditionally, and you don't need the approval of others. More often said than done, self love is a term you're bound to encounter on social media. Then why is it…

img.alt_text: Illustrative quote on self love and motivation

jetpack-related-posts.title: Inspiring Quotes To Help You Finally Learn New Skills
jetpack-related-posts.author: Team Roomi
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: It's that time of the year. You're all pumped up to follow the new year resolutions you've made. You're ready to say 'new year, new me' and take the world by storm! And you do this every year, but something or the other comes in the way and you eventually…

img.alt_text: New year resolutions, quotes, learn new skills

jetpack-related-posts.title: 10 Life Lessons That The Art Of Cooking Taught Us
jetpack-related-posts.author: Team Roomi
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: One good thing our shelter in place has given us is time! The time to look at and appreciate the little things in life. And the time to learn new things. Which for many of us has included learning the art of cooking, and the lessons learned from cooking. Browsing…

img.alt_text: A man in white shirt cooking in the kitchen
